info.title: io-vault Multi-Chain Core API
info.description: Core service for multi-chain vault management

get.description: List supported chains and the supported features
Retrieves a paginated list of addresses for the specified vault. By default, returns both monitored and unmonitored addresses. Use the monitored query parameter to filter by monitoring status.

post.description: Generates an address from the vault curves and saves it to the database. If a derivation path is provided, generates an HD address at that path. Optionally starts monitoring the address for transactions.

get.summary: List addresses for a vault and chain
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of addresses for the specified vault and chain. By default, returns both monitored and unmonitored addresses. Use the monitored query parameter to filter by monitoring status.

post.description: Create address for vault. By default, the address will not be monitored for transactions. Set monitor: true in the request body to monitor the address for transactions immediately.

get.description: Retrieves details of an address registered for monitoring in the specified vault.

patch.description: Updates the hidden assets and/or alias for registered address.

post.summary: Start monitoring an address for transactions
post.description: Start monitoring an existing address. If the address is already monitored, this operation is idempotent. If the address does not exist, returns 404.

delete.description: Stop transaction monitoring for an address. The address will be marked as unmonitored but will remain associated with the vault.

post.description: Create an HD (Hierarchical Deterministic) address for the vault. If no derivation path is provided, the next sequential index will be used automatically.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of HD addresses for the specified vault and chain.

post.description: Validates whether an address is correctly formatted for the specified blockchain. Does not verify ownership or existence on-chain.

get.summary: Get native balance for an address
get.description: Retrieves the native token balance (ETH, SOL, BTC, etc.) for a specific address on a given chain. Includes USD value conversion and token metadata.

get.summary: Get token balances for an address
get.description: Retrieves all token balances (ERC-20, SPL tokens, etc.) for a specific address on a given chain. Hidden tokens are filtered by default unless showHiddenTokens=true is provided.
Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for the specified address on the given chain. Requires treasury:view_transactions permission.

post.description: Scans an EVM or SVM transaction for potential security threats using Blockaid.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific transaction from PostgreSQL including classification data, native transfers, and token transfers. Requires treasury:view_transactions permission.

post.description: Builds an unsigned transaction for native currency transfer (ETH, SOL, BTC, etc.). Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.
Builds an unsigned transaction for token transfer (ERC20, SPL, TRC20). Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.

post.summary: Build durable nonce account creation transaction
post.description: Builds a transaction to create a Solana durable nonce account. Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.

get.description: Retrieves information about the Solana durable nonce account. Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.

post.description: Creates a transaction record for signing using a pre-built transaction hex, scoped to a specific ecosystem and chain. Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.
Creates a new reconciliation job that compares on-chain transaction data with locally stored records to identify discrepancies, missing transactions, and data integrity issues.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific reconciliation job including its status, summary statistics, timing information, and audit log.
Retrieves a paginated list of reconciliation jobs for the specified address on the given chain.

post.description: Creates a new vault with the specified elliptic curves for HD wallet derivation. Requires treasury:manage_vaults permission.

patch.summary: Set spam override for a token
patch.description: Marks a token as trusted or spam, overriding the automatic classification. Use "native" as tokenAddress for the native token.

delete.summary: Remove spam override for a token
delete.description: Removes the user spam override, resetting the token to use the global classification. Use "native" as tokenAddress for the native token.

patch.description: Sets spam overrides for multiple tokens at once (max 100). Tokens not found will be silently skipped. Use "native" as tokenAddress for the native token.

post.description: Creates a new transaction workflow. Requires treasury:initiate_transfer permission.
Confirms transaction review. Requires treasury:approve_transfer permission.

put.description: Reviews a pending transfer workflow. Requires treasury:review_transfer permission.

post.description: Approves a transaction. Requires treasury:approve_transfer permission.
Rejects a transaction. Requires treasury:approve_transfer permission.

get.description: Gets workflow status. Requires treasury:view_transactions permission.
Gets workflow event history. Requires treasury:view_transactions permission.
